item.title: Added Bip
item.description: https://bip.sh - Bip provides zero downtime deployment, a global CDN, SSL, and more for static websites. Free plan with 100GB/month bandwidth.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://amixr.io/ - Developer-friendly alerting and on-call management with brilliant Slack Integration, API and Terraform. Free phone call, SMS, Telegram, Slack and E-Mail packages.

item.title: Free temporary and disposable phone numbers
item.description: https://smsreceivefree.com/ - Provides free temporary and disposable phone numbers.

item.title: Update some PaaS description
item.description:
https://glitch.com/ - Free public/private hosting with features such as code sharing and real-time collaboration. Free plan has 1000 hours/month limit.
https://okteto.com - - Managed Kubernetes service designed for remote development. Free developer accounts come with 8GB of RAM, 4 CPUs and 5GB Disk space. The apps sleep after 24 hours of inactivity.

item.title: Added Fast.io
item.description: https://fast.io/ - Host PDFs, videos, images, etc. with direct links on a fast global network. Free and includes CDN, custom domains, and analytics. Free for Personal Projects includes 5 Sites, 500 MB per Files, Free 100 GB Usage / Month

item.title: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/ripienaar/free-for-dev in…
item.description:
https://free.getbricks.app/) - a note-taking app (PWA - Calculator](https://free.getbricks.app/) - a note-taking app (PWA) with a powerful built-in multiline calculator.
https://sourcelevel.io/ - Automated Code Review and Team Analytics. Free for Open Source and organizations up to 5 collaborators.
https://devpal.xyz/base64-decode/ - — Online free tool for decoding & encoding data.
https://www.zenhub.com - The only project management solution inside GitHub. Free for public repos, OSS and nonprofit organizations
https://apimocha.com - - Completely free online API mocking for testing and prototyping. Make up to 500 requests per day, fully customizable API responses, download mock rules as a Postman collection.

item.title: Update the Email list and UI and design list by adding free tools
item.description:
https://www.mail7.io/ - Free Temp Email Addresses for QA Developers. Create email addresses instantly using Web Interface or API
https://picsum.photos/) - A Free tool, easy to use stylish placeholders. Just add your desired image size (width & height - - A Free tool, easy to use stylish placeholders. Just add your desired image size (width & height) after our URL, and you'll get a random image.
